Thomas Kaldahl

Hi! I'm Thomas Kaldahl.
I am a senior at Rice University.
I'm pursuing a Bachelor of Science in Mathematics.

This website is intended as a showcase for my personal works and
explorations.
Feel free to browse around using the menu on top.

My GitHub is ei14.
